column3: added ExternalSystem TOPIC to notify when import has finished

Hi Martin, sorry for the late reply on your issue.
Have you seen ProjectDataImportListener#onImportFinished api?
Could you check if it's applicable for you?

Hi @vladsoroka
no, I haven't noticed that api. Although it doesn't give me the new module, it seems to be enough to resolve my problem. Thank you very much.

Also you can look on the com.intellij.openapi.externalSystem.service.project.manage.ProjectDataService extension point and extended import lifecycle methods in AbstractProjectDataService.
It should be enough to get all imported data and/or customize it.
If you need module information you can extends AbstractProjectDataService with the ProjectKeys.MODULE and use IdeModifiableModelsProvider#findIdeModule(ModuleData module) method:
This will work for initial import and all subsequent re-imports.
